body: Yes definitely -- maybe even just a list of function names should work. I imagine often folks won't care about the docstring. So `signatures` should take a list or dictionary
body_html: Yes definitely -- maybe even just a list of function names should work. I imagine often folks won't care about the docstring. So signatures should take a list or dictionary
